meaning_str.bing:
n. 命令；指挥；指令；司令部
v. 命令；指挥；控制；博得
网络. 命令模式；掌握；指定要运行的命令

命令模式；掌握；指定要运行的命令

命令；指挥；控制；要求；统率（陆军、海军等）；管辖；俯瞰；俯视；抑制（感情等）；驾驭（自己）；操纵（情绪或行为）
命令；指挥能力；掌握；管辖；运用能力；指挥权；指挥中心；司令部；兵团；军队；军区；视野；[计算机]指令；指挥官的职位（或地位）

1.en: Gen Abdel Fattah Younis was killed on Thursday en route from his command post on the front line near Brega to the rebel capital Benghazi.
1.cn: 周二，阿卜杜勒·法塔赫·尤尼斯将军在从指挥岗位返回班加西大本营的途中，在布雷加前线附近被杀。

2.en: For the last two years, an advance team of new Autobots has taken refuge here under my command. Arcees, get ready to launch.
2.cn: 过去的两年，一支由汽车人组成的先遣部队。在我的指挥下，寄居地球。阿尔茜，准备行动。

3.en: To understand the next command, you need a basic knowledge of the WLM concept of service class.
3.cn: 要理解下一个命令，您需要基本了解服务类的WLM概念。

0.en: Wait, are we still talking about the command prompts?
0.cn: 等等，我们还是在谈论命令提示吗？

1.en: On the command bar? On everything. And it starts with the little things.
1.cn: 在一个命令条上？在所有的东西上，但需要从小的东西开始

2.en: As long as you're in this company under my command, you're gonna obey my orders, Period.
2.cn: 只要你一直呆在这个连队里，由我指挥，你就得服从我的命令，句号。

3.en: That's when we take our shot. Get a clear shot, wait on my command and give her everything you got.
3.cn: 那时就是我们发动进攻的时候，一枪命中，听我命令，尽全力攻击。

4.en: Without any instruction or command, the shooting stopped and German and British soldiers met in no man's land.
4.cn: 在没有得到任何命令的情况下，英德两军停火，并相会于无主地。

5.en: You're the Lord Commander now. Command. Let others do the fighting. When was the last time Father used a sword?
5.cn: 你如今是队长，下命令嘛，让别人去打仗，你上次看父亲用剑是什么时候？

6.en: Furthermore, at the behest of the prince, it is hereby declared that every maiden in the kingdom, be she noble or commoner is invited to attend. Such is the command of our most noble king.
6.cn: 此外，根据王子的命令，在此宣布，王国之内所有未婚少女，无论贵族或平民，都被邀请参加舞会。以上为我们最尊贵的国王的命令。

7.en: There's over 20 different functions tied to every single variation of the command bar, which by the way, takes weeks to program.
7.cn: 超过20个不同的功能与命令条的变量有关联，随口说的一点东西，都需要一星期的编程时间

8.cn: 我会下令让朝中众臣都支持你。

10.en: You will command overall strategy. Your toon leaders will each command a battle group.
10.cn: 你将控制总体策略，你的小队长们将各领导一个战略小组。

11.en: 619 states that any command officer who is emotionally compromised by the mission at hand must resign set command.
11.cn: 619条规定了所有的指挥官如果做出了危及任务的情绪化的决定，就必须要交出指挥权。

12.en: It's how you stay in contact with me and the command center.
12.cn: 你们就靠它与我和指挥中心保持联系。

13.en: These are actual decrypted Enigma messages direct from Nazi High Command.
13.cn: 这是从纳粹最高指挥部截获的真正的恩尼格玛信息。

14.en: How do you remove them? Is there a command? Some nonstick spray? Crowbar?
14.cn: 你平时都是怎么弄开的？有什么口令吗？还是用了什么不粘材料？撬棍？

15.en: I see I'm not needed to lend you strength. You're fully in command of the argument.
15.cn: 看来我不需要助你一臂之力，你完全能控制得住局势。

16.en: Speed them up. And get a line to downing street, and to box emergency command. Yes, sir.
16.cn: 派他们过去，然后接通唐宁街和紧急指挥中心电话。是，长官。

17.en: Three. The armies of the West are prepared for battle, Great Khan. We await your command.
17.cn: 是三倍，西部的军队也都已整装待发，大汗，随时听您调遣。

18.en: There will be a command center out of the FBI office in Knoxville where we will coordinate.
18.cn: 联调局诺克斯维尔办公室会设立指挥中心我们将进行协调。

19.en: Jim, this is one rule you cannot break. To stop Nero, you alone must take command of your ship.
19.cn: 吉姆，这是规则，你不能随便打破，去阻止尼诺，你要成为舰长。
